homePage.metaData: My name is Lan and I am a software engineer. I have completed my master's studies at the Faculty of Computer and Information Science, University of Ljubljana.

aboutSection.title: About
aboutSection.description: My name is Lan and I am a software engineer. I have completed my master's studies at the Faculty of Computer and Information Science, University of Ljubljana. I am hardworking and precise, but also articulate and outgoing. I look forward to challenges where I can use my skills to help solve problems while gaining new knowledge and experience. In my free time, I enjoy working on various personal projects in the areas of computer science and programming, electronics, and photography, but I also always find time for family, friends, and sports activities. I am motivated by a desire to progress and help others.

competences.title: Web Development
competences.description: Development of Full Stack web applications with modern tools and methods (Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, React, Next.js, Vue.js, Nginx, Docker, ...).

competences.title: IoT Development
competences.description: Development of IoT (Internet of Things) systems and programming of IoT devices in programming languages C/C++.

competences.title: Design and content management
competences.description: Designing company web presence, editing WordPress websites and product photography for social networks.

projects.title: Lama Bot
projects.description: Development of an AI chatbot platform that helps businesses engage website visitors and automate customer interactions.

projects.title: Bonfires.ai
projects.description: Co‑developed a community-driven AI platform to collaboratively train multi-agent systems for collective sensemaking and on-chain governance.

projects.title: Yelay
projects.description: Collaborated on the development of a platform that allows institutions to easily access DeFi yield strategies and to manage risk-adjusted portfolios.

projects.title: Pikado Real Estate
projects.description: Development of a web application for a real estate agency.

projects.title: LetterBot
projects.description: Development of an AI-power web motivation letter generator.

projects.title: IJS - Department of Intelligent Systems
projects.description: Collaborated on the development of the backend for electronic and mobile health platform Insieme.

projects.title: Personal IoT Project
projects.description: Development of an IoT Building Heating Control and Management System

projects.title: Bang & Olufsen Slovenia
projects.description: Website editor, product photographer and social media manager.

cookies.title: Cookie Consent
cookies.message: This site uses cookies for operation and analytics. We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze our traffic.
